channel.title: Hackthebox on realspaceeagle
channel.description: Recent content in Hackthebox on realspaceeagle

item.title: HackTheBox: Poison Walkthrough
item.description: Detailed walkthrough of the Poison machine (10.10.10.84) covering LFI log poisoning, PHP RFI exploitation, credential recovery and a VNC pivot to root.

item.title: HackTheBox Soccer - Linux Machine Walkthrough
item.description: Complete walkthrough of HackTheBox Soccer machine featuring web exploitation, WebSocket SQL injection, and privilege escalation through doas misconfiguration.

item.title: CTF Writeup Template - Example Usage
item.description: Learn how to use the new CTF writeup template system with practical examples and shortcode demonstrations.

item.title: HackTheBox: Mentor Walkthrough
item.description: Detailed step-by-step walkthrough of HackTheBox Mentor machine (10.10.11.193). Learn reconnaissance, SNMP enumeration, web exploitation, and privilege escalation techniques with practical examples.
